channel.title: Handcrafting Beaded Jewelry

channel.description: Various discussions on techniques used for crafting beautiful pieces of jewelry along with interviews of jewelry designers. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Marissa Newman
channel.itunes:subtitle: Handcrafting Beaded Jewelry
channel.itunes:summary: Various discussions on techniques used for crafting beautiful pieces of jewelry along with interviews of jewelry designers. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: EPISODE 9 - Button Jewelry

item.description: How to create your own beautiful Button Jewelry.

item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 9 - Button Jewelry

item.title: EPISODE 8 - Polymer Clay Beads: Faux Techniques - Abalone & Coral
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: Step by Step techniques for creating beautiful ornamental beads. A discussion of various faux techniques. Abalone and Coral are highlighted.
item.itunes:author: Marissa Newman
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 8 - Polymer Clay Beads: Faux Techniques - Abalone & Coral
item.itunes:summary: Step by Step techniques for creating beautiful ornamental beads. A discussion of various faux techniques. Abalone and Coral are highlighted.

item.title: EPISODE 7 - Metaphysical Properties of Crystals and Gemstones
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: Learn about the metaphysical properties of gemstones and crystals with Guest Speaker Maureen Perez of Isisdivining.com.

item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 7 - Metaphysical Properties of Crystals and Gemstones
item.itunes:summary: Learn about the metaphysical properties of gemstones and crystals with Guest Speaker Maureen Perez of Isisdivining.com.

item.title: EPISODE 6 - Polymer Clay Beads: Faux Techniques - Wood and Leather
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: Step by Step techniques for creating beautiful ornamental beads. A discussion of various faux techniques. Wood, Veined Marble, and Bone and Leather are highlighted.

item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 6 - Polymer Clay Beads: Faux Techniques - Wood and Leather
item.itunes:summary: Step by Step techniques for creating beautiful ornamental beads. A discussion of various faux techniques. Wood, Veined Marble, and Bone and Leather are highlighted.

item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: Step by Step techniques for creating beautiful ornamental beads. A discussion of materials needed to craft polymer clay beads and the right equipment to use.

item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 4 - Polymer Clay Beads: An Introduction
item.itunes:summary: Step by Step techniques for creating beautiful ornamental beads. A discussion of materials needed to craft polymer clay beads and the right equipment to use.
